    @allure.description("To verify add product and checkout to payment screen")
    def test_01_pizza_menuitem(self):

        try:
            f = open("data.json", "r")
            data = json.loads(f.read())
            time.sleep(2)
            sign_in(self.driver, data["username3"], data["password"])

                Checkout_to_paymentscreen(self.driver)
                time.sleep(2)
            f.close()
        except Exception as e:

    @allure.step("To be able to select pizza sides and quantity")
    def select_pizza(driver, size, crust, additional_toppings, instructions):
        By_xpath = driver.find_element_by_xpath
        try:
            try:
                if size == "SM":
                    By_xpath(productlocators.pizza_small_size).click()
                elif size == "LG":
                    By_xpath(productlocators.pizza_large_size).click()
                else:
                    By_xpath(productlocators.pizza_Xlarge_size).click()
            except Exception as ex:
                raise ex
            find_element_by_text(driver, crust).click()
